member.name: T:Community.System.BitConverter
member.summary: Converts base data types to an array of bytes, and an array of bytes to base data types.

member.name: F:Community.System.BitConverter.IsLittleEndian
member.summary: Indicates the byte order ("endianness") in which data is stored in this computer architecture.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.DoubleToInt64Bits(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the specified double-precision floating point number to a 64-bit signed integer.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.Int64BitsToDouble(System.Int64)
member.summary: Converts the specified 64-bit signed integer to a double-precision floating point number.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the specified Boolean value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Char)
member.summary: Returns the specified Unicode character value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Int16)
member.summary: Returns the specified 16-bit signed integer value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the specified 32-bit signed integer value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns the specified 64-bit signed integer value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Single)
member.summary: Returns the specified single-precision floating point value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the specified double-precision floating point value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.SetBytes(System.Int16,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Set two bytes at a specified position in a byte array with the specified 16-bit signed integer value

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.SetBytes(System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Set four bytes at a specified position in a byte array with the specified 32-bit signed integer value

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.SetBytes(System.Int64,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Set eight bytes at a specified position in a byte array with the specified 64-bit signed integer value

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.SetBytes(System.Single,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Set four bytes at a specified position in a byte array with the specified single-precision floating point value

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.SetBytes(System.Double,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Set eight bytes at a specified position in a byte array with the specified double-precision floating point value

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Returns the specified 16-bit unsigned integer value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns the specified 32-bit unsigned integer value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.GetBytes(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Returns the specified 64-bit unsigned integer value as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToBoolean(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a Boolean value converted from one byte at a specified position in a byte array.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToChar(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a Unicode character converted from two bytes at a specified position in a byte array.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToSingle(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a single-precision floating point number converted from four bytes at a specified position in a byte array.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToDouble(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a double-precision floating point number converted from eight bytes at a specified position in a byte array.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToInt16(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a 16-bit signed integer converted from two bytes at a specified position in a byte array.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToInt32(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a 32-bit signed integer converted from four bytes at a specified position in a byte array.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToInt64(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a 64-bit signed integer converted from eight bytes at a specified position in a byte array.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToUInt16(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a 16-bit unsigned integer converted from two bytes at a specified position in a byte array.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToUInt32(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a 32-bit unsigned integer converted from four bytes at a specified position in a byte array.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToUInt64(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a 64-bit unsigned integer converted from eight bytes at a specified position in a byte array.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts the numeric value of each element of a specified array of bytes to its equivalent hexadecimal string representation.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToString(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts the numeric value of each element of a specified subarray of bytes to its equivalent hexadecimal string representation.

member.name: M:Community.System.BitConverter.ToString(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts the numeric value of each element of a specified subarray of bytes to its equivalent hexadecimal string representation.
